file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 2019Q2
  title: Gene-knockout correlation
  description: This site provides an API access to gene-knockout correlations based
    on  [Cancer Dependency Map (DepMap)](https://depmap.org/portal/download/)
    data. By using this site, you agree to DepMap's [Terms and
    Conditions](https://depmap.org/portal/terms/).
  termsOfService: https://depmap.org/portal/terms/
  contact:
    name: Broad NCATS translator
    email: translator@broadinstitute.org
paths:
  /genes:
    get:
      tags:
        - types
      summary: Retrieve list of genes
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/gene"
  "/correlations/{entrez_gene_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - types
      summary: Retrieve correlations for a gene
      parameters:
        - name: entrez_gene_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/correlation"
servers:
  - url: http://indigo.ncats.io/gene_knockout_correlation
components:
  schemas:
    gene:
      type: object
      properties:
        gene_symbol:
          type: string
        ensembl_gene:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        entrez_gene_id:
          type: integer
        synonym:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
    correlation:
      type: object
      properties:
        entrez_gene_id_1:
          type: integer
        entrez_gene_id_2:
          type: integer
        correlation:
          type: number
